GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: possible module reference underflow in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit b59bee8b05b0e789b5a298cacb09e8aaa3367a29, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 8cfd9b0f8515e7c361bba27e2a2684cbd427fe01. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: nf_tables: possible module reference underflow in error path
